title: Cartoon & Comedy Sounds
description: 'Cartoon & Comedy Sounds' by Cinematic Sound Design features a collection of more than 250 hand-crafted sounds. Designed & recorded at pristine 24-Bit/96 kHz resolution using the highest quality equipment providing a discrete signal path.
longDescription:
'Cartoon & Comedy Sounds' by Cinematic Sound Design features a collection of more than 250 hand-crafted sounds. Designed & recorded at pristine 24-Bit/96 kHz resolution using the highest quality equipment providing a discrete signal path.


This collection was designed & recorded using top quality equipment providing a discrete signal path, Sound Devices 702 field recorder, a pair of Neumann KM184 microphones, Access Virus Ti virtual analog synthesizer, DSI Prophet analog synthesizer, and Waldorf Pulse 2. An Apogee Symphony AD/DA has been used for additional processing and routing.


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/cinematic-sound-design/cartoon-and-comedy-sounds-demo
technicalDetails:
Features: 269 hand-crafted sounds

Number of Audio Waves: 269 (44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAV)

Number of Audio Waves: 269 (96 kHz, 24bit Stereo WAV)

Number of Audio Cues: 269


Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5:05

Supported Development Platforms: Supporting most platforms that support Wav files
